phrases: You two were found collapsed by the stairs.
Kaizaki-kun, you shielded Kariu-san from the fall.
Inukai-sensei, Inukai-sensei, please come to the staff room.
I will be back in a minute.
Your classmate, Hishiro-san, let us know.
She carried your stuff here, too.
I knew it... that was Hishiro-san's.
What was she trying to do?
She is got top sales again.
We will lose face if we let a woman trounce us like this.
Why will not she just quit?
Has not she worked it out yet?
She is in charge of his training, right?
Do not rat us out, Kaizaki.
We will make absolutely sure nothing like this happens again.
Please, let us make it up to you.
You know this mess was not your fault!
We went over the order several times
while you were showing me the ropes!
Does not it make you mad?
Knocking others down to gain an advantage is a fruitless endeavor.
It means they have given up on winning any other way.
we all competed fair and square.
somehow we went from rivals to enemies.
Seeing hard workers turn out like that does not make me mad.
Were you trying to bully her?
Apparently, Hishiro-san found us and let the teachers know.
I am pretty sure she took that green bag home with her.
I just wanted to trouble her a bit...
I was going to hide it somewhere.
Do you think harassing her is the only way you will beat her?
Are you going to tell her I tried to harass her because I was jealous?
That is why you knew it was her bag,
and that is why you are mad at me.
I bet I could hurt you more if I told Oga.
But... that is what I think.
Trying to knock others down a peg just means lowering yourself.
Do not go trampling all the hard work and trust you have built up.
It insults the effort you put in.
The only way that would make you happy
is if you were a loser who would given up on trying.
But I do not think that describes you.
The Kariu I know hates losing,
and is a hard worker with a strong heart.
Because I know how hard you have worked,
Do not act like some filthy adult.
Do not give up on try
What the hell are you lecturing me for?
Not only that, they do not even see me as a rival!
Honoka for sports, Hishiro for studies...
I am trying desperately to beat them!
So why do they act like I am no threat at all?!
Why am I the only one with problems?!
I try and try and try and...
No matter how hard I try, I get nothing in return.
You are just too busy comparing yourself to others to see.
Those comparisons are not the only measure.
Do not say it is all pointless.
You have worked hard and made yourself better.
That is what you got in return.
Always got to act tough, huh?
You said no matter how hard you tried...
She was in the staff room this late...
I bet she had questions for the teachers.
There are things even she does not find easy.
She is really awkward, after all.
I think you have got the wrong idea about her, too.
You have never really talked to her.
Next time you get a chance, ask her to smile for you.
I just lectured her like an old man!
Do not give up on trying.
Talk about pot calling the kettle black.
I am one to talk, considering I gave up.
Thinking about it did not get me anywhere, so I waited to ask you.
Why did Kariu-san have my bag?
I have thought about it a lot,
but all I can think of is that she stole it, so I am confused.
Kariu-san and my eyes have been meeting often lately,
and every time, I have made sure to smile.
So I thought we were friendly.
What the hell should I tell this malice-free tone-deaf communicator?!
Sh-She thought it was dangerous to leave the bag lying in the hall.
So she thought she would take care of it for you.
Now that I know the reason, I feel a lot better.
I knew she could not have tried to steal it.
But I could not think of anything else.
Is getting rid of all the thorns in someone is path really what is best for them?
Kariu took your bag to cause problems for you.
so she was jealous and frustrated.
She is even denser than Oga.
Then if I give her this, can we be friends?
Yeah, I guess you would not get it.
for someone so smart, you can be really dense.
You have not noticed that everyone is mad at you, have you?
I do not understand what I say that makes people so mad.
I do not understand how they feel.
I know that is because I have not properly socialized.
I have tried to study up on it,
but I just do not know what is right.
There is no right answer for getting along.
Sorry, I did not mean to overload you.
I am going to wait for Kariu-san.
I want to be her friend for real.
But I do not know how.
If I do not know the right answer...
Like you are asking a teacher?
When I saw your hands wrapped protectively around her,
why did I feel a pang?
It is ineffective to deal with many problems at once.
I think I have to take care of this myself.
Like I can possibly just leave!
I do not know, will she?
You should be used to this by now.
Wherever you go, I go with you.
You are supposed to be watching me, not Hishiro.
The influence your choices have on those around you
is also a target of my observations.
I have been waiting for you.
She knows I had her bag.
Do you want this silver pin that badly?
I heard you tried to run off with my bag.
She ratted me out for ratting Kariu out!
When I asked why you would do that,
he said your motive was this silver pin.
So I asked if we could be friends if I gave you this,
Then why did you take my bag?
Why would you do that to someone you do not hate?
I do not know how she can keep asking this stuff.
No matter how hard I try, I cannot win.
You stood where I wanted to.
And ever since you won, you have always,
always flashed that mocking smile, so of course I hate you!
Why would I ever do that?
Every time our eyes meet, every time we speak!
Next time you get a chance, ask her to smile for you.
I am trying to think of a reason I would mock
A normal smile, like you would do if your eyes met someone is!
Er... wait... let me get this straight.
Hishiro thinks that is a smile?!
She was trying for a friendly smile.
Have you even looked in a mirror?!
Do you have any idea how it makes people feel?!
I thought you were mocking me this whole time!
I have been smiling in the hope that we could be friends.
My strong point is I am smart.
If I do not understand something,
I look into it on my own, and if I still do not get it, I ask until I do.
My weak point is that I am not interested in other people.
Because of that, I do not know how to interact with anyone,
and I must have caused lots of problems for people.
But right now, I am trying to change myself.
Kariu-san, that is who I am.
But would you be my friend?
It is my pleasure, Hishiro Chizuru-san.
she was not intentionally ignoring the handshake.
But in return, recognize me as your rival!
I will not lose next time!
I will definitely take that silver pin from you!
If you want it, you can have it next test...
I want it, but not like that!
If you hold back, we are not friends!
I am really sorry about all this.
I will not do it again.
Whoa, so you can actually smile.
But I smile all the time.
What did you take a picture for?
A test subject grinning because a high school girl LIMEd him.
Why are we drinking at my place, anyway?
For an ex-NEET, you sure are serious.
Was what I told Kariu really the right thing to say?
In reality, I could not grow up, and became a NEET.
And those awful bullies probably still have their jobs.
I know the real truth is uglier.
Maybe it was not the ugly truth.
But it was not a lie.
It is what you really meant, so is not that enough?
When she is out in the real world and stumbles,
she will remember someone yelling at her, if not who.
I think what happened today will stay with her.
Though, really, it was the pot calling the kettle black!
Yelling at her for comparing herself to others!
Says the man so worried about appearances, he pretended he still had a job!
Is it letting you take a long, hard look at yourself?
The way you see through everything is seriously driving me nuts!
I-I do not mind eating lunch with you.
Do not you want to change?!
Hishiro, you need to first practice how to smile.
But I thought I was doing it right.
Show me how it is done, Kariu-san.
This Is not the First Time
I do not want to hear that from you!
